mn116:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati isigilismim pabbate.
mn116:2.1: “Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etam vebharam pabbatan”ti?
mn116:2.3: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, vebharassa pabbatassa annava samanna ahosi anna pannatti.
mn116:2.4: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etam pandavam pabbatan”ti?
mn116:2.6: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, pandavassa pabbatassa annava samanna ahosi anna pannatti.
mn116:2.7: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etam vepullam pabbatan”ti?
mn116:2.9: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, vepullassa pabbatassa annava samanna ahosi anna pannatti.
mn116:2.10: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etam gijjhakutam pabbatan”ti?
mn116:2.12: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, gijjhakutassa pabbatassa annava samanna ahosi anna pannatti.
mn116:2.13: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, imam isigilim pabbatan”ti?
mn116:3.1: “Imassa kho pana, bhikkhave, isigilissa pabbatassa esava samanna ahosi esa pannatti.
mn116:3.2: Bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, panca paccekabuddhasatani imasmim isigilismim pabbate ciranivasino ahesum.
mn116:3.3: Te imam pabbatam pavisanta dissanti, pavittha na dissanti.
mn116:3.10: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
mn116:3.11: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
mn116:4.1: “Arittho nama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmim isigilismim pabbate ciranivasi ahosi;
mn116:4.2: uparittho nama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmim isigilismim pabbate ciranivasi ahosi;
mn116:4.3: tagarasikhi nama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmim isigilismim pabbate ciranivasi ahosi;
mn116:4.4: yasassi nama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmim isigilismim pabbate ciranivasi ahosi;
mn116:4.5: sudassano nama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmim isigilismim pabbate ciranivasi ahosi;
mn116:4.6: piyadassi nama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmim isigilismim pabbate ciranivasi ahosi;
mn116:4.7: gandharo nama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmim isigilismim pabbate ciranivasi ahosi;
mn116:4.8: pindolo nama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmim isigilismim pabbate ciranivasi ahosi;
mn116:4.9: upasabho nama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmim isigilismim pabbate ciranivasi ahosi;
mn116:4.10: nito nama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmim isigilismim pabbate ciranivasi ahosi;
mn116:4.11: tatho nama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmim isigilismim pabbate ciranivasi ahosi,
mn116:4.12: sutava nama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmim isigilismim pabbate ciranivasi ahosi;
mn116:4.13: bhavitatto nama, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmim isigilismim pabbate ciranivasi ahosi.
mn116:6.10: Ango ca pango ca guttijito ca;
